casebody.data:
UNITED STATES, petitioner,
v.
Victor J. STITT, II. No. 17-765. Supreme Court of the United States Sept. 24, 2018. Joint motion of respondents for divided argument denied. Motion of respondent Jason D. Sims for appointment of counsel granted, and Jeffrey L. Fisher, of Stanford, California, is appointed to serve as counsel for respondent Jason D. Sims in No. 17-766.
